title: INIA
text: LABSAF R package development provides multiple functions exploratory spatial soil analysis. multiple user-friendly functions exploring Earth Engine catalogue dataset using tidyverse syntax derived tidyrgee rgee. Finally multiple functions spatial exploratory graphics also mapping derived ggplot, sfmap tidyterra.

title: INIA
text: can install first version labsaf GitHub: following code just copy paste R console:
